segments.text: Hi , Kerry . Did your husband make cooking for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , please do not mention it any more . Last night he did it for the first time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Forget it ! It was a bitter pill for me to swallow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was the first time . You should not be so particular .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ha-ha . Last night , I only told him practice makes perfect .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It â€™ s true . Nowadays , men are spending more and more time in the kitchen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it will become a wider trend .
segments.speaker: S2
